title: Ryze is too complicated
body:
I just played a game as Ryze.  Honestly, his Q in LOLWiki was like reading a university text on the theory of existentialism.  I almost had a seizure trying to comprehend it.

This is literally the dumbest champion in League.  Simplify his kit so I don't have to do calculus every time I want to use an ability.  Less is f'ing more.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=FlatEarth Jacois,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rQvElEtm,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-24T07:47:17.396+0000)
>
> I almost had a seizure trying to comprehend it.
> 
> This is literally the dumbest champion in League.

Yes.

It is the champion that is dumb here.
Some characters are a bit more complicated or niche but come with high reward, while others are more simplified and streamlined for a more straightforward experience.
This sounds more like sloth than anything.
ryze isnt really complicated outside of his combos, your quick dmg combo w e q, his full dmg combo q w q e q, his escape combo e w q and his wave clear q e q
